description.en: Topics covered by the course include: Problem and market research; product ideation and vision; product strategy and metrics; sketching and prototyping; project presentation
description.et: Kursusel käsitletakse järgmisi teemasid: probleemi tausta- ja turuuuring; toote ideearendus ja visioon; tootestrateegia ja mõõdikud; visandamine ja prototüüpimine, projektiesitlus

objectives.en: This course allows students to apply the knowledge gained during the specialization module in a real-life project. Industry partners will provide project ideas and help coach the students during the course of the project.
objectives.et: Kursuse raames rakendavad tudengid tootedisaini ja -juhtimise erialamooduli varasemates ainetes omandatud teadmisi ja oskusi projektides partnerettevõtetega.

learning_outcomes.en: On successful completion of this course, students will able to:
learning_outcomes.et: Kursuse eduka läbimise järel on tudengid võimelised:

learning_outcomes.en: 1.	Turn a problem statement into a product vision.
2.	Develop a product strategy and corresponding metrics to assess success.
learning_outcomes.et: 2.	välja arendama tootestrateegia ja mõõdikud edukuse hindamiseks.

learning_outcomes.en: 4.	Present the prototype to potential customers.
5.	Understand how to manage a product innovation project in a real-life setting.
learning_outcomes.et: 4.	mõistma, kuidas käib tarkvaratoote juhtimine praktikas
